idea: Dear sir, Sub: REGISTRATION OF OUR FIRM AS YOUR APPROVED SUPPLIER OF FERROUS AND NONFERROUS METALS NINE PIPING SOLUTIONS an ISO 9001:2015 certified company pleasure in introducing as an esteemed name engaged in Manufacturing, Exporting and Supplying of Stainless Steel, Nickel Alloy, Mild steel, Carbon Steel, Alloy Steel, Copper, Brass, Aluminium, Hastelloy, Lead in form of: PIPES & TUBES: We deal in Stainless Steel, Carbon Steel and Alloy Steel in ERW (Welded), Semi Seamless & Seamless make. All these materials are available in NB sizes as well as OD sizes in all qualities. We can also arrange Pipes and Tubes as per the CUSTOMERS requirements, which is other than the Standard size  SHEETS, PLATES & COILS: We are Direct Importers of Sheets, Plates and Coils in all Sizes and Qualities in Stainless Steel from the BEST Manufacturers to give you the ULTIMATE in QUALITY. requirements of Copper, Brass & MS Qualities can be met at ease.  FLATS & STRIPS: Requirement of Flats and Strips in all Metals, FERROUS & NON-FERROUS, in all Qualities and Sizes can be met. RODS & BARS: We also stock Round Bar, Square Rod, Rectangular Bar, Hexagonal Rods, etc. in all Qualities and Sizes. PIPE FITTINGS: We also Stock Pipe Fittings in Stainless Steel, Carbon Steel and Alloy Steel, etc. in all Sizes and Make (Seamless, ERW). Maintaining the ACCURATE SPECIFICATIONS in Fittings is our SPECIALITY. Products are Elbows, Stub ends, Reducers, Flanges, Valves, Nuts, Bolts, Screws. etc. REFRIGERATION QUALITY COPPER TUBE:  We deal in Refrigeration Quality Copper Tube Capillary Tubes & PVC Coated Tubes in coils and straight lengths of various sizes. INDUSTRIAL RAW MATERIALS: PTFE Products, PVC Products, Nylon Products, HDPE Products, UHMW PE Products, Neoprene Products, Asbestos Products, PEEK Products, Silicone Products, PU Products,  Delrin Products, Bakelite Products, etc.  We also stock MONEL, NICKLE, HASTALLOY, INCONEL,TITANIUM, COPPER, BRASS, ALUMINIUM, LEAD, TIN, ZINC, GUN METAL, WHITE METAL.  and other Minor Metals in all Shapes and Sizes as per the CUSTOMERS requirement. We have got ready stock of the above items in various sizes as per National / International Standards & Specification & the same shall be supplied as per your requirements at very reasonable rates. We can arrange any Third Party inspection agency like LRIS, BVIS, IBR, TUV, DNV, MECON, MDL etc. As we are very much interested to do business with you on a long term basis, we request you to please send us your valued purchase enquiries from time to time so as to enable us to quote our most competitive rates and terms.  Assuring you of our best co-operation always
name: NINE PIPING SOLUTIONS

idea:
Bhoomi, as the name suggests, Indian land focuses on improving land fertility and delivering high-tech service to Indian farmers.

At Bhoomi, we are working on developing such technological-based solutions. Our ongoing projects involve analyzing soil and climatic data, building risk assessment models, Deep learning models to inspect crop infection, AI system to analyze market demand and supply data of production and end-to-end supply chain platform for farmers to sell their production directly to customers at much more profitable price. 

As students of the Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay, we are Tech-enthuse and are closely incorporating minds from top agriculture institutes. We soundly believe the fusion of AI-tech with farming can immensely benefit the lives of millions of Indian farmers.
name: Bhoomi

idea: We believe in the power of Nature. We have different varieties of skin and body wellness products such as moisturizers, body lotions, mists, compacts, anti-aging liquids, etc., made entirely of organic materials present easily in nature. This product helps a person to achieve proper regime for betterment of their overall body from inside out. We believe that inner beauty can be achieved using only natural and organic ingredients that you can also eat. For us beauty is not just an external aspect but the wellbeing of a person's inner self, that our product helps bring forth in every individual.
name: LAYANAA WELLNESS LLP

idea:
To provide health management vertical information. Enabling individual to understand health management pipeline. Making them aware on key streams of health practices. Providing integral health solutions and what to expect from Strems like Allopathy, Ayurveda, Naturopathy, Yoga, Meditation and Acupressure. 


An integral health vertical awareness;  Making one a health manager. So one can refer the right medium for explicit solution rather then taking any one stream professional as a complete health manager.


Few Awareness Points after going through the program;


Allopathy - A powerful tool for diagnosis and acute management.


Ayurveda - Know your body type through Nadi Parikshan and balance elements. Herbs for long term chronic management. 


Naturopathy - How to heal body with food and get all the vitamins and minerals through natural sources. Designing own diet palate based on Allopathy diagnosis and Ayurveda Nadi Parikshan.


Yoga - Selective poses and asanas as per diagnosed; to improve flexibility and endurance.


Meditation - Mental awareness and getting over mental stress.


Acupressure - To get awareness on body important points to improve the blood flow.


Through the above integral approach. The individual can actively propel forward from acute chronic management to symptom free management with natural care.
name: Yogin Enriching Eternity
